summary: During the first years of Algeria's independence, Djaffar and Hamid embrace a bright and promising future. After several decades, secrets and betrayals drive them apart.
cast: Lyès Salem|Khaled Benaïssa|Djemel Barek|Amal Kateb|Najib Oudghiri|Sabrina Ouazani|Anne Zander|Boukefa Abdou|Mathias Melloul|Boukefa Abdullah|Kader Affak|Ahmed Benaissa|Samir El Hakim|Samuel Jouy|Amazigh Kateb|Mourad Khen|Meriem Medjkane|Hichem Mesbah|Miglen Mirtchev|Mehdi Ramdani|Nathalie Saugeon
title: L'Oranais
